newsitem.title: USA: Winston Hotels CFO Philip Alfano to resign.
newsitem.headline: Winston Hotels CFO Philip Alfano to resign.

text.p: Winston Hotels Inc said Tuesday that that Philip Alfano will resign as chief financial officer of the company to pursue personal interests.

Alfano will continue to handle day-to-day operations as CFO during the near-term and remain available in an advisory role to assist the company in the transition to a new CFO, a news release issued by Winston said.
The company said it engaged the executive search firm of Heidrick and Struggles to help select Alfano's replacement.
Winston is a real estate investment trust specializing in the acquisition, rehabilitation and development of premium limited-service and high-end extended-stay hotel properties.
